text: recipes the ingredients you're gonna
need 1 cup of sticky rice 1/2 a cup of
peeled split mung beans rinse well and

50 gram of sugar and half a cup of

and glutinous rice and toss well to mix

now add the sticky rice and mung beans

also add about 1/4 cup of water making

cover the rice and beans like this is
good
now cook in the rice cooker until done

when it's still very hot so it's better

vigorously until all the rice grains and

incorporate more vegetable oil into the
